statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'XYZ Insurance';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 101 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND insurance_provider = 'Blue Cross';
DELETE FROM bills WHERE bill_amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'UNPAID';
DELETE FROM BillingInformation WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'Unpaid';
DELETE FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE provider_name = 'HealthInsurance' AND policy_number LIKE 'P123%';
DELETE FROM Billing WHERE patient_id = 3 AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Female'
